author: A_Brickset_user
title: O.K.
review:
I love basketball, i mean i just love it so much and i'am good too. So when this set came out in 2003 I was instantly thrilled. i think this was the first one i got of the collector ones. 

Pros:
There are three cool NBA player Mini-figs.
They have cards to go with them.
Cool jerseys.

Cons:
Box said 10 pieces but it came with 9.
Allen iverson's hair was turned sideways and not front ways.
The mini-fig's face wears off easily (Usually around the lips)
